search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Todoist (todoist.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Todoist can be found at: [https://todoist.com/pricing](https://todoist.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Beginner
--------

Start organizing your life for free

US$0

* * *

An account with:

*   5 personal projects
    
*   Smart quick add
    
*   Task reminders
    
*   Flexible list & board layouts
    
*   3 filter views
    
*   1 week activity history
    
*   Integrate email, calendar, and more
    

* * *

![Image 2](https://res.cloudinary.com/imagist/image/fetch/q_auto,f_auto,c_scale,w_2624/https%3A%2F%2Fwww.todoist.com%2Fstatic%2Fpricing%2Fpro.svg)

Pro
---

Organize your work and life

US$4per user/month  
$48 billed yearly

* * *

Everything in Beginner, plus:

*   300 personal projects
    
*   Calendar layout
    
*   Task duration
    
*   Custom task reminders
    
*   150 filter views
    
*   Unlimited activity history
    
*   AI Assistant
    
*   Deadlines
    

* * *

Designed for teams!

![Image 3](https://res.cloudinary.com/imagist/image/fetch/q_auto,f_auto,c_scale,w_2624/https%3A%2F%2Fwww.todoist.com%2Fstatic%2Fpricing%2Fteams.svg)

Business
--------

Manage your teamwork, too

Create a team for free, then

US$6per user/month  
$72 billed yearly

* * *

Everything in Pro for every member, plus:

*   A shared team workspace
    
*   Up to 500 team projects
    
*   Calendar layout for team projects
    
*   Granular team activity logs
    
*   Shared templates
    
*   1000 team members & guests
    
*   1000 project folders
    
*   Team roles & permissions

App of the day

Best To-Do List App

Best Wear OS

Join 30 million+ people who rely on Todoist to manage work and life
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Plus tens of thousands of teams from companies of all sizes.

[Start for free](https://app.todoist.com/auth/signup)

[Start for free](https://www.todoist.com/downloads/linux)

[Read the plans FAQ](https://todoist.com/help/articles/teams-faq-lQhBHo0y6)

[](https://todoist.com/home)Join millions of people who organize work and life with Todoist.

Features

1.  [How It Works](https://todoist.com/features)
2.  [For Teams](https://todoist.com/teamwork)
3.  [Pricing](https://todoist.com/pricing)
4.  [Templates](https://todoist.com/templates)

Resources

1.  [Download Apps](https://todoist.com/downloads)
2.  [Help Center](https://todoist.com/help?utm_source=todoist&utm_medium=landing_page&utm_campaign=pricing)
3.  [Productivity Methods](https://todoist.com/productivity-methods)
4.  [Integrations](https://todoist.com/integrations)
5.  [Channel Partners](https://todoist.com/channelpartners)
6.  [Developer API](https://developer.todoist.com/)
7.  [Status](https://status.todoist.com/)

Company

1.  [About Us](https://doist.com/?utm_source=todoist&utm_medium=landing_page&utm_campaign=pricing)
2.  [Careers](https://doist.com/jobs?utm_source=todoist&utm_medium=landing_page&utm_campaign=pricing)
3.  [Inspiration Hub](https://todoist.com/inspiration?utm_source=todoist&utm_medium=landing_page&utm_campaign=pricing)
4.  [Press](https://doist.com/press/?utm_source=todoist&utm_medium=landing_page&utm_campaign=pricing)
5.  [Twist](https://twist.com/?utm_source=todoist&utm_medium=landing_page&utm_campaign=pricing)

*   [](https://twitter.com/todoist)
*   [](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ_61yRKscCnkIJBPoR15EA)
*   [](https://facebook.com/todoist)
*   [](https://www.instagram.com/todoistofficial)

*   [Security](https://todoist.com/security)
*   [Privacy](https://doist.com/privacy)
*   [Terms](https://doist.com/terms-of-service)

© Doist Inc.

Your tasks are organized in projects. Archived projects don’t count towards your limit.

Capture and organize tasks and due dates the moment they come to you with easy-flowing, natural language.  
  
From a simple "Send email to Bob tomorrow at 4 pm" to a specific "Draft team report every 3rd Tuesday starting Aug 29 ending in 6 months".

Get reminders via email or push notification when a task is due so nothing slips through the cracks.

Toggle your tasks between a traditional list and a kanban-style board view.

Filters are custom views to see tasks with specific attributes across your entire Todoist account.

How far you can see historical changes on a task or project.

Connect Todoist with 90+ calendar, communication, automation, and voice assistant tools.

Your tasks are organized in projects. Archived projects don’t count towards your limit.

Visualize and plan your tasks and personal projects in a calendar layout. Upgrade to Business for calendar layout in team projects, too.

Estimate how much time a task will take to make planning your days a breeze.

Tweak the timing of automatic reminders, add multiple reminders per task, and even trigger them based on your location.

Filters are custom views to see tasks with specific attributes across your entire Todoist account.

How far you can see historical changes on a task or project.

Let artificial intelligence help you with your tasks and filters.

Stay on track by setting deadlines for your tasks.

Each team comes with 5 free projects so you can get a feel for teamwork in Todoist. Upgrade your team for more projects.

A shared space where members can preview and join team projects and create new ones.

Your team’s tasks are organized in projects. Archived projects don’t count towards your team’s limit.

Visualize and plan your team projects in a calendar layout.

See a detailed view of your team's activity drilled down by team members and task actions (like overdue tasks).

Share your own carefully crafted templates with your team.

Members are full teammates who can access all public projects in your team workspace and create new ones.  
  
Guests are external collaborators who can only access the projects they’re invited to.

Create folders in your shared workspace to group and organize team projects.

Control who is an admin or a member in a team. Only admins can manage team settings.

Pay for your whole team on one invoice.

Your tasks are organized in projects. Archived projects don’t count towards your limit.

Every member can be a part of total 500 active projects across team and personal projects.

Add due dates and/or times to your tasks so you never miss a thing.

Use color priority levels, from 1 to 4, to make sure the most important things on your list stand out.

Break big tasks into small, manageable sub-tasks. You can even break down those sub-tasks into smaller ones.

Get reminders via email or push notification when a task is due so nothing slips through the cracks.

Upload any type of file to task comments and keep relevant information organized with your tasks.

Visualize and plan any project’s tasks in a traditional to-do list layout. Switch between layouts anytime.

Visualize and plan any project’s tasks in a kanban-style board layout. Switch between layouts anytime.

Visualize and plan any project’s tasks in a calendar layout. Switch between layouts anytime.

Create any view you like with custom filters. For example, all your p1 tasks due today or all the tasks labeled @waiting in your “Work” project.

Share personal projects ad hoc with friends and loved ones to divvy up household chores or plan a vacation.

Task and project comments can include written notes, voice notes, and file attachments.

Assign tasks to a friend, family member, or teammate so everyone knows who’s responsible for what.

Get a shared space to collaborate on team projects – alongside but separate from your personal ones.

See a detailed view of your team's activity drilled down by team members and task actions (like overdue tasks).

Add work projects to your team workspace to make sharing work easy.  
  
Team projects are accessible to all team members by default. (You can also choose to make them private).  
  
Archived projects don't count towards your team's limit.

Every member can be part of total 500 active projects across team and personal projects.

Share team projects with your teammates.  
  
People in team projects can be admins, full team members or team guests.

No need to create projects from scratch. Save time by using the templates library.

Team members can access all public projects in your team workspace and create new ones.

Team guests aren’t full members of your team. They can only access the team projects they’re invited to.

Create folders in your shared workspace to group and organize team projects.

Control who is an admin or a member on a team.  
  
Only admins can manage team settings and prevent members from taking certain actions, like inviting external collaborators as guests to team projects.

Pay for all your team members on one invoice.

Type periodic due dates the way you would talk (e.g., “tomorrow”, “every other day”, “every May 3”). Todoist automatically recognizes natural language and will set the due date accordingly.

Batch similar tasks across projects together with custom labels. E.g., @email, @waiting, or @home.

Add relevant notes and links underneath the task name so you have all the info you need to get started.

Visualize completed tasks and goal progress with beautiful graphs.

Connect Todoist with 90+ calendar, email, communication, automation, and voice assistant tools.

Tweak the timing of automatic reminders, add multiple reminders per task, and even trigger them based on your location.

Add a start time and duration to your tasks to create a realistic plan for each day.

Let artificial intelligence help you with your tasks and filters.

Rest easy knowing you can always restore automatic backups if you accidentally delete a project.

Check all the historical changes on a task or project.

Choose from a variety of color themes to customize the look of your Todoist.

Start for free, then find the plan that’s right for you. Try Pro or Business to unlock features to do your best work.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Todoist offers a free tier and two paid subscription plans with annual billing discounts.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Start organizing your life for free

features: Everything in Pro for every member

Your tasks are organized in projects. Archived projects don’t count towards your limit.

Capture and organize tasks and due dates the moment they come to you with easy-flowing, natural language.  
  
From a simple "Send email to Bob tomorrow at 4 pm" to a specific "Draft team report every 3rd Tuesday starting Aug 29 ending in 6 months".

Get reminders via email or push notification when a task is due so nothing slips through the cracks.

Toggle your tasks between a traditional list and a kanban-style board view.

Filters are custom views to see tasks with specific attributes across your entire Todoist account.

How far you can see historical changes on a task or project.

Connect Todoist with 90+ calendar, communication, automation, and voice assistant tools.

Your tasks are organized in projects. Archived projects don’t count towards your limit.

Visualize and plan your tasks and personal projects in a calendar layout. Upgrade to Business for calendar layout in team projects, too.

Estimate how much time a task will take to make planning your days a breeze.

Tweak the timing of automatic reminders, add multiple reminders per task, and even trigger them based on your location.

Filters are custom views to see tasks with specific attributes across your entire Todoist account.

How far you can see historical changes on a task or project.

Let artificial intelligence help you with your tasks and filters.

Stay on track by setting deadlines for your tasks.

Each team comes with 5 free projects so you can get a feel for teamwork in Todoist. Upgrade your team for more projects.

A shared space where members can preview and join team projects and create new ones.

Your team’s tasks are organized in projects. Archived projects don’t count towards your team’s limit.

Visualize and plan your team projects in a calendar layout.

See a detailed view of your team's activity drilled down by team members and task actions (like overdue tasks).

Share your own carefully crafted templates with your team.

Members are full teammates who can access all public projects in your team workspace and create new ones.  
  
Guests are external collaborators who can only access the projects they’re invited to.

Create folders in your shared workspace to group and organize team projects.

Control who is an admin or a member in a team. Only admins can manage team settings.

Pay for your whole team on one invoice.

Your tasks are organized in projects. Archived projects don’t count towards your limit.

Every member can be a part of total 500 active projects across team and personal projects.

Add due dates and/or times to your tasks so you never miss a thing.

Use color priority levels, from 1 to 4, to make sure the most important things on your list stand out.

Break big tasks into small, manageable sub-tasks. You can even break down those sub-tasks into smaller ones.

Get reminders via email or push notification when a task is due so nothing slips through the cracks.

Upload any type of file to task comments and keep relevant information organized with your tasks.

Visualize and plan any project’s tasks in a traditional to-do list layout. Switch between layouts anytime.

Visualize and plan any project’s tasks in a kanban-style board layout. Switch between layouts anytime.

Visualize and plan any project’s tasks in a calendar layout. Switch between layouts anytime.

Create any view you like with custom filters. For example, all your p1 tasks due today or all the tasks labeled @waiting in your “Work” project.

Share personal projects ad hoc with friends and loved ones to divvy up household chores or plan a vacation.

Task and project comments can include written notes, voice notes, and file attachments.

Assign tasks to a friend, family member, or teammate so everyone knows who’s responsible for what.

Get a shared space to collaborate on team projects – alongside but separate from your personal ones.

See a detailed view of your team's activity drilled down by team members and task actions (like overdue tasks).

Add work projects to your team workspace to make sharing work easy.  
  
Team projects are accessible to all team members by default. (You can also choose to make them private).  
  
Archived projects don't count towards your team's limit.

Every member can be part of total 500 active projects across team and personal projects.

Share team projects with your teammates.  
  
People in team projects can be admins, full team members or team guests.

No need to create projects from scratch. Save time by using the templates library.

Team members can access all public projects in your team workspace and create new ones.

Team guests aren’t full members of your team. They can only access the team projects they’re invited to.

Create folders in your shared workspace to group and organize team projects.

Control who is an admin or a member on a team.  
  
Only admins can manage team settings and prevent members from taking certain actions, like inviting external collaborators as guests to team projects.

Pay for all your team members on one invoice.

Type periodic due dates the way you would talk (e.g., “tomorrow”, “every other day”, “every May 3”). Todoist automatically recognizes natural language and will set the due date accordingly.

Batch similar tasks across projects together with custom labels. E.g., @email, @waiting, or @home.

Add relevant notes and links underneath the task name so you have all the info you need to get started.

Visualize completed tasks and goal progress with beautiful graphs.

Connect Todoist with 90+ calendar, email, communication, automation, and voice assistant tools.

Tweak the timing of automatic reminders, add multiple reminders per task, and even trigger them based on your location.

Add a start time and duration to your tasks to create a realistic plan for each day.

Let artificial intelligence help you with your tasks and filters.

Rest easy knowing you can always restore automatic backups if you accidentally delete a project.

Check all the historical changes on a task or project.

Choose from a variety of color themes to customize the look of your Todoist.

Start for free, then find the plan that’s right for you. Try Pro or Business to unlock features to do your best work.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Todoist offers a free tier and two paid subscription plans with annual billing discounts.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Start organizing your life for free

features: Everything in Pro for every member

promotional_offers.offer_description: Save 20% when billed annually instead of monthly.
